titles.title: Recognizing the importance of access to comprehensive, high-quality, life-affirming medical care for women of all ages.
Recognizing the importance of access to comprehensive, high-quality, life-affirming medical care for women of all ages.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for women nationwide to have access to comprehensive, convenient, compassionate, life-affirming, and high-quality health care.
